医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基于机器学习的先兆子痫风险预测研究使用医疗记录纵向信息人工智能系统（MERLIN）开发了一个基于机器学习的模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Machine-learning-based-preeclampsia-risk-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Machine-learning-based-preeclampsia-risk-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5c545e3-a283-4c7f-8ad5-0c481c8b5a0b Mon, 21 Aug 2023 08:16:00 -0400 Machine learning-based preeclampsia risk prediction
年轻男性心肺健康与特定部位癌症发病率之间的关联最近的一项研究评估了健康年轻男性的心肺健康与某些癌症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Associations- Between-cardiorespiratory-fitness-in-young-men-and-the-incidence-of-site-specific-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Associations- Between-cardiorespiratory-fitness-in-young-men-and-the-incidence-of-site-specific-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84438095-fbcf-4b0e-82b5-14c5d2afb77d Mon, 21 Aug 2023 07:59:00 -0400 Associations between cardiorespiratory fitness in young men and the incidence of site-specific cancer
重新设计针对 SARS-CoV-2 的 SARS-CoV-1 中和抗体的混合方法一种混合方法，结合传统发现和抗体重新利用来对抗 COVID-19。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/A-hybrid-approach-to-re-engineer-a-SARS-CoV-1-neutralizing-antibody-against-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/A-hybrid-approach-to-re-engineer-a-SARS-CoV-1-neutralizing-antibody-against-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c4be698-a595-4f81-b756-cdc2fb5052b3 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 07:47:00 -0400 A hybrid approach to re-engineer a SARS-CoV-1 neutralizing antibody against SARS-CoV-2
皮肤炎症控制的护理标准和最新进展研究人员讨论了当前针对儿童和青少年特应性皮炎的治疗干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-standard-of-care-and-recent-advancements-in-the-control-of-skin-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-standard-of-care-and-recent-advancements-in-the-control-of-skin-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ef7a14b-d03f-4aa4-9d08-563e0b11512f Mon, 21 Aug 2023 07:39:00 -0400 The standard of care and recent advancements in the control of skin inflammation
基于人工智能的模型表明胸部X光检查是衰老的潜在生物标志物最近的一项研究开发了一种人工智能模型，通过分析胸片来确定个人的年龄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/AI-based-model-indicates-chest-radiography-as-a-pottial-biomarker-of-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/AI-based-model-indicates-chest-radiography-as-a-pottial-biomarker-of-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee21116e-b935-4aaf-96da-7c48f6a87c4a Mon, 21 Aug 2023 07:30:00 -0400 AI-based model indicates chest radiography as a potential biomarker of aging
素食主义：对健康有什么好处？研究人员描述了素食的健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Vegetarianism-what-are-the-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Vegetarianism-what-are-the-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad817d99-e8b5-4240-9043-96dea799817c Mon, 21 Aug 2023 07:01:00 -0400 Vegetarianism: what are the health benefits?
早发癌症的发病有哪些模式？最近的一项研究研究了 2010 年至 2019 年美国早发癌症的发病率模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/What-are-the-patterns-in-the-incidence-of-early-onset-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/What-are-the-patterns-in-the-incidence-of-early-onset-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0c7c771-f346-41f5-b5b4-2283635b4437 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 06:50:00 -0400 What are the patterns in the incidence of early-onset cancers?
智能手机应用程序在测量膳食钠摄入量方面的有效性研究人员评估了智能手机应用程序测量钠消耗量的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-effectness-of-a-smartphone-application-in-measuring-dietary-sodium-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-effectness-of-a-smartphone-application-in-measuring-dietary-sodium-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=060e4a4b-e3ae-4dac-a61f-eb391759f4f7 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 06:44:00 -0400 The effectiveness of a smartphone application in measuring dietary sodium intake
部落卫生工作者的薪酬与同行不同。看看内华达州为什么改变这一点。琳达·诺内奥（Linda Noneo）打开了货车里的暖气，以抵御即使在六月下旬内华达州北部高地沙漠中仍然存在的清晨寒冷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Tribal-health-workers-arene28099t-paid-like-their-peers-See-why-Nevada-changed-that.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Tribal-health-workers-arene28099t-paid-like-their-peers-See-why-Nevada-changed-that.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d5a0f89-e7c4-4db6-832d-c8afbbd204c3 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 06:39:14 -0400 Tribal health workers aren’t paid like their peers. See why Nevada changed that.
新冠测试失败后，疾病预防控制中心致力于彻底改革实验室运营2020 年 2 月上旬，纽约州公共卫生实验室的克尔斯滕·圣乔治 (Kirsten St. George) 和她的团队接受了美国疾病控制与预防中心开发的一项测试，用于诊断感染新型快速传播冠状病毒的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-CDC-works-to-overhaul-lab-operations-after-covid-test-flop.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-CDC-works-to-overhaul-lab-operations-after-covid-test-flop.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb39c188-805f-40cb-a77f-7fcf36c32eae Mon, 21 Aug 2023 06:36:53 -0400 The CDC works to overhaul lab operations after covid test flop
